subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims at supporting sector specific policies and programmes to advance MDG goals and targets in addition to developing capacities for effective local governance ensuring linkages with macro policies and resource flows, and ensuring the MDGs are integrated into national development planning and resource allocation processes
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: MDG Framework
